description: ReadTheDocs - also allows public distribution of assets
Issues/ideas started to be created on the repository

discussion.notes: Dr. Andrei disagrees about dark mode being the better design - choice is essential! The "daily" wording and text seemed to be too repetitive and redundant, and while the `+` and `-` buttons are easy, it does not offer the satisfaction of a tick in a checkbox - that should be incorporated in the wireframes.
